example.parse: ( (IP (ADVP (AD 但是)) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 认为) (IP-OBJ (CP (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 中东)) (VP (ADVP (AD 似乎)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (VA 平静))))) (SP 的)) (PU ，) (IP (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 如果)) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 我们)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 去) (VP (VV 管) (NP-OBJ (PN 它))))))) (PU ，) (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 如果)) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 我们)) (VP (ADVP (AD 只要)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 入侵) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 伊拉克)))))) (PU ，) (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 如果)) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 我们)) (VP (ADVP (AD 只要)) (ADVP (AD 没有)) (VP (VV 推翻) (NP-OBJ (NN 独裁者)))))) (PU ，) (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 如果)) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 我们)) (VP (ADVP (AD 只要)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 去) (VP (VV 挑战) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP-PN (NR 黎巴嫩)) (DEG 的)) (NP-PN (NR 叙利亚)) (NP (NN 势力)))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (PN 一切)) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 万事大吉))))))) (DEC 的))) (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 种))) (NP (NN 观点))) (PU ，) (FLR (IJ 嗯)) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 根本)) (ADVP (AD 就)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (NN 事实)))) (PU ．)))
example.arg: 如果我们不去管它，如果我们只要不入侵伊拉克，如果我们只要没有推翻独裁者，如果我们只要不去挑战黎巴嫩的叙利亚势力
